example.eg: There are fifty states in the union.
In 1948, a Jewish state was founded.
example.egtrans: 一个犹太国家于1948年建立。

example.eg: I can only imagine the state the house is in after being abandoned for so many years.
example.egtrans: 这栋房子在废弃多年后，我可以想象出它现在的样子。

example.eg: Ice is water in its solid state.

dsense.name: state
dsense.guideword: esp US (of political sub-division) (联邦制国家)

example.eg: State law prohibits speeding.
The groom stated his love for the bride.
example.egtrans: 新郎表白了自己对新娘的爱。

example.eg: The president stated the policy in clear terms.
example.egtrans: 总统明确正式声明了政策。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 正式声明, 正式宣布

example.eg: I plan to visit Chicago on my upcoming trip to the States.
example.egtrans: 我打算去美国旅游的时候看看芝加哥。

example.eg: The butterfly is in its larval state.
example.egtrans: 这只蝴蝶正处于它的幼虫阶段。

example.eg: She was in a state of sadness after her boyfriend left her.
example.egtrans: 男朋友离她而去之后，她心情沮丧。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 心情, 心境, 心态

example.eg: Polly was in such a state after the accident!
example.egtrans: 事故之后，波莉的情绪极度紧张。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 极度紧张的情绪, 非常紧张的状态

example.eg: The state has outlawed destructive behaviour.
example.egtrans: 政府已经宣布破坏性行为为违法行为。

example.eg: In some countries, there is separation between church and state.
example.egtrans: 在某些国家，政教是分离的。

dsense.name: state
dsense.guideword: US, informal (Department of State) (非正式用语)

example.eg: The boys over at State are a smart bunch.
example.egtrans: 在国务院的小伙子们都挺聪明。

example.eg: This is a state matter.
The judge was sworn in during a state ceremony.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 正式仪式的, 典礼的

example.eg: Vatican City is a present-day example of a city-state.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 城邦, 暗深势力集团, 深暗势力

example.eg: Gary was wandering around, his eyes glazed over as if in a dream state.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 睡梦状态, 心流状态

dsense.name: free state
dsense.guideword: US, historical (US state prohibiting slavery) (历史用语，指禁止奴隶制度的州)

example.eg: Not all of the Union states were free states; four were slave states.
Nitrogen is in a gaseous state at room temperature.

dsense.name: head of state, Head of State

example.eg: In a kingdom, the head of state is a king rather than a president.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 心烦意乱, 紧张不安

example.eg: The election results were inconclusive, and left the country in a state of confusion.
After the party, several people were staggering around in a state of inebriation.
The European Parliament represents people living in the member countries of the European Union.
The European Union consists of 28 member states.
In its natural state, the lake was much clearer than it is now.
Germany became a police state under Hitler's rule.
She didn't work when she went to school: she received state aid.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 固态的, 政府的经济援助，国家援助，联邦政府援助, 州政府援助
国家控制, 国家监控
国家出资的，政府投资的, 州政府出资的，州政府投资的

dsense.name: state law
dsense.guideword: US (legal system of a US state)

example.eg: State law prohibits the making of alcohol at home.
When she saw another store close its doors, she realized it was a sorry state of affairs.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 事态, 情况, 情况
变化中, 不断变化的状态

example.eg: His current state of mind seems confused.
example.egtrans: 他目前的精神状态好像很混乱。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 思想状态，精神状态, 心理状况
自然状态, 天然状况, 原始状态
动荡不安的状态，形势紧张

dsense.name: state of the art
dsense.guideword: (technology: current level) (技术: 当前的水平)

example.eg: In tech, it can be hard to keep up with the state of the art.
Our new TV uses state-of-the-art technology to provide the best picture and sound.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 先进的, 高新尖的, 尖端的

example.eg: When times are tough we live in a constant state of uncertainty.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不确定状态, 困惑状态

example.eg: He was shocked by the woman's state of undress.
They have been in a near-constant state of war for years.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 国有制, 全民所有制

dsense.name: state police
dsense.guideword: US (law force of a US state)

example.eg: Most interstate and state highways are patrolled by state police, not local police.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 国有资产, 国家财产
陈述明显事实, 把明显的事情说出来

example.eg: The new rules allow you to state your case for the person you're voting for.
Amtrak is a good example of a state-owned company.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 国有企业, 国营公司
全州的, 私人客舱, 特等舱
全州的, 全州范围的

example.eg: The measure was popular locally, but not statewide.

dsense.name: steady state
dsense.guideword: (physics: condition which does not change over time)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 暂态, 瞬态, 瞬态

example.eg: Britain's welfare state was created in the wake of the Second World War.
